website_summaries.verdict: A retro-style tankini swimsuit with an athletic edge thanks to the racerback cut and striped design.
pros: Suits a lot of body types with a longer skirt, elastic tummy control, and ruched material around the hips with adjustable side ties
Feminine flared skirt over bikini briefs
Comfortable and stylish and comes in a wide range of colors
cons: A few found the style more frumpy than vintage

customer_reviews.title: Lovely swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I loved how comfortable and cute this swimsuit was. I ordered a size up (large) and it was too big. I had to send it back and order my size. I am 5'2 and 155 pounds. I ordered a medium. I also wear a 36B bra size. Hope this helps because most reviews said to order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Missdrake79

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first Amazon review I've ever left. But I had to rave about this swimsuit. I took a risk ordering it and it is perfect! I am 5'9", 200lbs, size 16W. I ordered the XXL and it's a perfect fit. Excellent fabric, cute and comfy but not frumpy! If they had it in red I'd order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: 2XL fits me perfectly. I am 215lbs, 5' ...
customer_reviews.text: 2XL fits me perfectly. I am 215lbs, 5' 5", and have bra size of 40DD. This is the first bathing suit I have bought online and this is also the first bathing suit I have ever owned that made me feel sexy/cute wearing it. It has A LOT of padding in the bust, which normally isn't something I care for, but in this case it helps shapes my body to a more hour glass figure. I want to say the padding is almost a 1/4 inch thick. It is well fastened in, so the padding does not shift around. (I have had other bathing suits with padding that rolls/shifts around after the first swim).
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered the medium and it's perfect for my upcoming trip
customer_reviews.text: I base everything I purchase off reviews. This is exactly what I was looking for, wasn't sure how it would fit. When it arrived, I immediately tried it on and it fit exactly as the other reviewers described it. I ordered the medium and it's perfect for my upcoming trip. Don't hesitant to purchade!!
customer_reviews.author: constant reader

customer_reviews.title: I am 61 and this bathing suit is fun, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am 61 and this bathing suit is fun, comfortable, and hides everything I need it to do. Rather than looking like I was outdated in this retro style, it seemed more like I was having fun with an old fashion style.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Wicked cute!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials. I love that it's a 2 piece since I have a long torso. I am a (45 yr old) Gramma & try to dress appropriately. This swimsuit is not "too young" nor "too old" looking. Very modest & adorable! I am 5'8" & weigh 170. 38D bra. I normally wear 12-13, depending on style. I ordered "up" to XL on this suit although I believe I could've gotten a Large & would be fine. The skirt covers my rear end which is what I love most as most bathing suit skirts don't these days. I would def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sheilamae13

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4 weight 205 bra size 38c wear around 16-18 in pants depending on size. Ordered the 2x the fit of this suit is great, the skirt is a little short in the back so I'll wear shorts under I don't really like my thighs lol but super cute swimsuit and good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: brandy gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but size up
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'3, 200lbs, 38DD and big bottom. After reading reviews, I went up and got an XXL. This swimsuit fits me great. It covers my chest, and the padding helps with the control. The top is not too tight on my stomach, it's a nice tightness that lets you know it won't flap or roll up. I'm debating removing the padding since it does show a lot, being a 38DD. Overall its a nice suit, material and quality looks and feels good. The skirt covers my behind. This is comfortable enough that I will wear it to a water/adventure parks as an outfit without feeling under dressed and don't have to worry about my regular clothes getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: Duchess

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit, good fit!
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought it was too small. I had a heck of a time getting the top on, but once I got the ladies in their places, it fit just fine. I am 5ft 2, 180lbs and a XL fit me fine. I know there were some breast support concerns for me being a 38D, but the padded cup area works well. I ordered the size I usually wear. I did NOT order a size up, as some reviewers had suggested. I will be keeping it. Very cute, and seems to flatter my figure well. I plan to use this swimsuit for camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Cute bathing Suit!
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest "bathing suit" ever. I didn't get to use it, but when I tried it on, I was just thrilled. ahhh well...there's always summer :) The 2 piece aspect, the lower half of the top is loose-ish like in the picture, if you get the right size. I'm sure if you are too flat or too big in the chest for your specific size, it might fit weird. I'm fairly small-chested and my size fit well everywhere. The bottoms cover up my butt too. The skirt part is well-flared, which I like. :)
customer_reviews.author: DreamsiclesASMR

customer_reviews.title: XXL - Too small for size 16
customer_reviews.text: I wished so much that this suit had fit, it is super cute! I order several sizes to try since the reviews were all over the place. I am 5'5", 40D, size 16 waist and the 2XL was too small in the bust area and too tight around the waist. Great company to deal with, if your order is not fulfilled by Amazon: One of the sizes I ordered was not free returns but the company refunded me and told me to keep the suit to donate. I never even tried it on, since the largest size was too small. I guess I will keep it for if I ever lose weight again.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice modest suit
customer_reviews.text: Nice modest suit. I received a lot of compliments on it this summer. The padding in the top is a little out of control... I took it out and was much more happy with it. The back has a sort of racer back style. When I wore this suit all day at the beach, the dye (I have the navy blue) stained my skin. I did not pre wash it (whoops) ... and then I was worried about it running in the wash and discoloring the white parts. I threw it in the wash with a Tide Color catcher and all was good! So pre wash - use a color catcher and you should be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: thegreenbeagle

customer_reviews.title: Super, super adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this swim dress! I'm 5'7", 135lbs, normally a size 4 in bottoms and ordered a size Small. I was a little nervous since products online tend to run very small. Both the top and bottom fit perfectly and the cut is super flattering. I trusted the other ladies in the reviews who mentioned checking the size chart but that the suit appeared to fit close to their normal pant size.
customer_reviews.author: LizTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: No Need for a Swim Cover Up!
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit! It's perfect for a mom chasing two toddlers around the beach and pool, as the skirt keeps me covered and full coverage bottoms stay in place. What's wonderful is that I don't need to pack extra clothes or wear a swimsuit cover, since this suit is designed to look like you are wearing a tennis skirt, tank top and sports bra! It's so convenient to just throw this on with some sandals and head to the pool. I will even wear it to a store or restaurant, as it looks like I am just wearing really cute workout clothes and not a bathing suit! So creative! Love this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: The swimsuit is adorable. The material is high grade. Unfortunately the suit didn't fit like I had hoped. I have a extra large top and it just wouldn't hold me in enough . If I was younger that would be an asset. I would like to say I have never been so amazed at the service. I bought the suit one day and got in in two days. I sent it back for a larger size and got it the day after I ordered a larger size. This company has the best customer service I have ever seen and I've been using Amazon for years. I will definitely buy for this company!!️👍
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover 4

customer_reviews.title: This is a great swim suit for any age!!
customer_reviews.text: You have to be a skeptic after reading the reviews on this, regarding sizing...they are all over the place! Mine arrived today. It fits perfectly, and is so cute and flattering! I am 5' nothing, and weigh 100 pounds, with a size 32 A cup, and I ordered a medium. I wear sz. 4 bottoms and small tops. I am also 70+ and feel very comfortable wearing it. It is modest, but not like typical items an older person might wear. Also, I found the cup inserts to be very comfortable and just the right size. I always dress 'young' but not revealing, so this is the perfect solution! I love it!! Now I can swim with my grand-kids :)
customer_reviews.author: m.doob

customer_reviews.title: 30 yr old grandma i looked like
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, I really did. I ordered a size larger and the top was too baggy and frumpy. The bottoms fit. I just looked like a grandma in it and I'm only 30. I decided to order another top and wear the bottoms that came with it. Maybe if I would have ignored the reviews telling you to order a size up, then the top would have fit better. For the record, I'm 5'3 and 130, small boobs, big butt and hips. Don't size up, stick with YOUR size. Ignore the reviews telling you to size up.
customer_reviews.author: jordanaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Supportive for bigger chest
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews about the top not being supportive for bigger chested women but I feel it has great support. I'm 5' 3" and 150 with a 36DD chest and I purchased a size large and I am very pleased with the fit, support and comfortability
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: size: xs color: navy blue/white
customer_reviews.text: I'm petite, 5" and 85 lbs, so I purchased size xs, which fits perfectly for me. The material is high quality and the color is exactly as it has shown, navy blue. I especially like the skirt (skort) because the material is thick enough for it to "open-outward", it is quite cute. Also, I love its modest style, so I can wear it comfortably almost anywhere when I'm active under the sun. I don't need to change between kayaking, biking, swimming, tennis, sunbathing...or just walking around on beaches.
customer_reviews.author: penguin in Boston

customer_reviews.title: cutest bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this bathing suit. I am about 5'9 and wear a size 14. I ordered a XXL and it was a very nice fit. The skirt is not too short and the top is cut high under the arms. Very happy. I want the other colors !!
customer_reviews.author: Harvard Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun suit!
customer_reviews.text: Nice stretchy fabric that feels fairly substantial; that is its not too thin. Color dark blue is nice. I wear a size 12 and ordered the L. The suit fits very well. My only complaint would be that the seam under the bust is very high and the cups of the removable pads are super thick. Since there is double material in this area, they can be removed if needed. If one is on the border between a 12 and a 14, the 14 will probably be more comfortable. This is a fun looking suit and definitely gives one good coverage. Modest, but still fun and good-looking.
customer_reviews.author: Mele K

customer_reviews.title: New favorite swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh this thing is too cute. It looks like a tennis outfit so I feel comfortable traveling to and from beach, or chasing the little ones without a cover-up. The skirt is mid-rise and hits just below my belly button which is great because it helps tuck in a non-toned area. The padding is a perfect thickness and offers just the right amount of support- no major cleavage push-up but no bouncy boobs either :) I'm 5'5'', 135 lbs, 32B cup. Ordered Medium and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute, flattering swimsuit!
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is SO cute and fits really well. I debated for a long time whether to order it because I have such a hard time finding any swimsuit to fit me. I’m glad I took a chance on this. It’s very flattering and I feel comfortable in it! For size reference I’m 5’6, 160 lbs and a size large fit me perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Monica W

customer_reviews.title: Father approved !!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a protective daddy needless to say, but here's the skinny on it. A little big in the chest for a 10yr old "easy fix", but she absolutely loved it, and it covered perfectly where it should !!! Update... over the summer... well let's just say we had to remove the correction to the top section 😡 but I still approve of the swimwear.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo_7877

customer_reviews.title: Sporty, fun swimsuit.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the swimsuit. Daughter loves the "anime skirt". Great fabric, seems well made. Modest, sassy and fun. The top runs longer than expected which would be great for long torso girls. It bunches a bit on my daughter, but should at least fit through the whole swim season.
customer_reviews.author: Bateman

customer_reviews.title: 10x better than a $120 designer suit
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit is awesome! It fits like a glove, and is made of good quality material. I'm 5'3" and 135-140ish, and bought a Medium; it's perfect! This is the 3rd swimsuit I bought this year - the first was a $120 designer tankini ( I hated the fit), and the second was a bikini from a popular anchor store at the mall (I didn't like that either). So, in this case, the most affordable option was also the most comfortable and well-made. It's an excellent value. I'm keeping this suit and will be returning all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Slagle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t hold up for more than a few uses :(
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a week long cruise. Wore once to beach and once in jacuzzi on the boat. Was hand washed on cruise after each use. Washed once when we returned home and just went to put on to go to beach and the fabric is completely see through in spots!! Didn’t last for more than a few uses! Really disappointed as it was the best fitting suit I’ve had in a long time....
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit when using company measurement pic!
customer_reviews.text: This suit is fantastic! I'm a 38F and the is the first suit I can wear without a swim bra! Support is not like a bra, but plenty good enough for rec swimming. Fit was perfect. I went by the measurements, not size. I'm 195lb and 5'4". I wear a 14 on bottom and xlarge on top. I got the XXL(16w) and it fits great. Use a measure tape and go by the picture measurement (it was with pink suit pics) from the company and it will fit perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hubner

customer_reviews.title: Big Girls won't cry!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3" 184lbs. Getting into a swimsuit is not my idea of fun but these suits made me look and feel absolutely awesome and sexy! The skirt is the perfect length to cover the top of the thighs without being too long. The racerback shows off tanned shoulders, the double layer look is fun, and the fit is excellent. I thought the horizontal stripes would not be good for my pear shape but it ended up being fun and light looking. The colors are gorgeous and the breast support is exceptional. I purchased the dark blue and the light blue and am extremely happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: MTC

customer_reviews.title: Cute suit - glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm not happy with my physique right now - this suit is very cute and well-made - and I'm less self-conscious in this suit than any others. The skirt (unlike any other I could find on the market) actually flares and so it moves gracefully when you walk. The top is well-made. Whole suit is very cute. Not the fault of the suit but because I am pear-shaped the bottom fits perfectly but the top is a bit loose (Size L). I was leery about buying a bathing suit online, sight unseen, but am quite pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Doran

customer_reviews.title: Dye comes off
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bathing suit and I had one in navy blue but the dye came off so be very very careful!!! I decided to order another one a year later in red but again the red dye comes off just be careful what you’re sitting on
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Harris

customer_reviews.title: A Great figure flattering suit
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute suit! I am a 43 yr old mom of two and always looking for a modest suit that is flattering. This suit fits the bill! I measured my self and ordered to the sizing chart and it was true to size. Buying suits has always been my least favorite thing, and buying online was amazing for this suit.
customer_reviews.author: K. Welter

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Modest, and Practical
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a size 2-4, but I ordered a size 0-2 because some swimsuits are a bit large on me. I had a small chest but am bigger through my hips. This causes the swimsuit bottoms to be a little tight on me but not unbearably tight. That being said, I love this suit. It's modest and alluring! I like how it covers my bikini line so I don't have to shave it! It comes with pads in the top, but I took them out because they were too much for me and it's fine without them. I've washed it once, and it turned out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor B.

customer_reviews.title: Impeccable Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two different sizes - the XL fit and the L was a little small. Their customer service team contacted to resolve the issue with the large I was returning and were extremely kind and helpful. I would recommend buying from them. By the way this suit is so awesome I ended up ordering the red one too! I really appreciate the full support of the bra on the top. I can't wait for the Western WA weather to coopoerare with me so I can wear that one.
customer_reviews.author: Trophy Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great bathing suit, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought size large(12-14) and works well. I also bought my mother one. She is the same weight as me but I’m a C cup and she is a D cup, 5”4 so I bought her the size (16-18) and fix great on her. We are very pleased. They are very comfortable especially for being on the heavier size. I have a tummy but skinny legs just like my mother. And these suits make you feel good in. Your fat don’t show like in other bathing suits I’ve tried. So pleased with with both these purchases.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice blue colour but it is too large on the top
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviewers comments and the size guide and bought the medium. Fits well on the skirt, but the top is too big under the bust area (I'm a 34D). It has HUGE cups and no actual shelf bra under the boobs so it feels weird and doesn't give much support. The area under the boobs and stomach are very loose and flap around. Pity as I really liked the look of the rest of this dress. If it had support and a strap under the boobs I would keep it. Unfortunately I'm returning it.
customer_reviews.author: KiwiLA

customer_reviews.title: The skirt gives a nautical look....just too cute for words! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for a teen girl’ mama. The girl is visiting the US but her mom is a pastor’s wife in a small town in Belarus. She chose the black and white striped swimsuit....we are guessing it will fit in size M. Her moms wish was for a skirted swimsuit for modesty. This arrive and we were so excited when we saw it!it is way cuter that on line! The skirt is adorable! Black and white is a great color! And even the top was modest without being “ old last” . Simply said, it looks perfect! Now, if it fits?? We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: becky simmons

customer_reviews.title: Fit just a little off
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this was a super cute suit, in the picture. You really do have to be like the model in the picture to make some of these suits work, at least for me. I ordered a large, just a little too big but would have worked out OK. I’m 5’ 7” and 150 lb. I’m not sure how to explain but the bra top just didn’t fit quite right. The padded cups were pretty thick and the opening was pretty big so the cup pieces kind of floated around and I couldn’t get them to sit just right. I wish I didn’t have to send back. It’s really so cute!
customer_reviews.author: D. TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this suit. I am 5'3 and 170 pounds with my weight pretty evenly distributed. 40/35/40. I chose to buy the XL because I do NOT like lumps and bumps or appearing as though I squeezed into something. This is perfect! Not tight, not loose, fits rather well, good length on the skirt and fit on top. I am also 47 and my bikini days are long gone and I thought my bathing suit days were too til I found this little gem. I purchased black and red and they should work perfectly for my upcoming cruise.
customer_reviews.author: MellieB

customer_reviews.title: No support for women with natural large breasts
customer_reviews.text: This suit may be cute on small chested girls but will not hold up heavier chested. I ordered a medium and a large in this suit. The medium was too small and the large was too big. My breasts were falling out of the bra that’s inside from the bottom. The bra part is right in the front so unless you get the whole thing too small it won’t give you support. The material was fine but I think the skirt part was too flouncy.
customer_reviews.author: D. V. Moye

customer_reviews.title: The perfect Swim suit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this online based on all the other reviews and I am so impressed. I'm 5'7" 145 and purchased the large. It is the best suit I've ever purchased. It fits true to size, very flattering, super cute and very well made (not cheap see through fabric) It also does some tummy concealing which I was not aware I actually needed, as it turns out, it was ;) I did however, remove the pads because for me, they were more of a nuisance and not really needed. This will definitely be my go to suit.
customer_reviews.author: MV

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this last minute for a Mexican vacation. I am 195 lb, 5’5” and I am 38-40DD, size 12-14 jeans and XL tops. I have a bigger top then bottom but this fit perfectly. I ordered a size XL the baby teal color and I can’t tell you how pleased I was with this. It fit absolutely perfectly. If you wear a size 16 on the smaller side like 14-16 XL would fit you. It is comfortable, covers your belly hiney and I can’t say enough about it. I was very happy I ordered this!
customer_reviews.author: Trina Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable — but ripped on first wear
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this bathing suit as soon as I put it on! Unfortunately, the bottoms ripped the very first time I wore them :( They weren’t too snug — in fact, they were a tad too loose (so they didn’t rip from being the wrong size). I am returning them for a refund and will probably give it another shot and repurchase (that’s how much I liked it). The style is adorable, the suit is comfortable, and it offers full coverage, but with a cute look.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great suit for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Really love this suit. The top fits perfect, which is always hard to find when you have large breasts. I do wish though that it had more of a tummy control top but it's still really cute. The cups are removable, which is good because they have way too much padding and just make my breasts look that much bigger
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: It's just adorable, and enormously flattering
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just the cutest. I'm always hesitant to buy clothes online, since my weird body never fits anything properly, but the other reviews convinced me to give it a try, especially for the price. It's just adorable, and enormously flattering, even for someone of a, let's say "thicker" build. I love the old-timey feel. This is a fantastic swimsuit, and if you're still on the fence, read more of the reviews. It's everything everyone is saying and more. I'm thrilled that I found a suit that accentuates the good stuff, hides the bad stuff, and doesn't make me feel like a granny on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: snipeTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, but buy the larger size
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’10” and 185 lbs. I initially ordered the L because I wear a size 12 in everything else. I saw the reviews that said to size up, but I thought that a 16/18 would be way too big. I should have listened to the reviews. The Large fit, but not as well as it should have. I ordered the XL to compare, and that fits like a dream. I sent the L back. Overall, it’s a really cute suit, and well-made. I feel very comfortable in it, and can’t wait to wear it on my upcoming cruise! If you’re debating on which size to get though, err on the side of larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and the quality of this suit! However it runs small. I’m 5’4” and 130 lbs and ordered the Medium 8/10 suit. I could get it on but it was way too tight. I returned the suit and ordered the next size up. Hopefully it will fit just right. - Update - I received the Large 12-14 immediately and it fit perfectly! Love it! Be sure and order a size larger than normal and you will be really happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. DeHaan

customer_reviews.title: Nice style, but is kind too tight
customer_reviews.text: In general, I like this style. But it doesn't fit as expected. It's kind too tight, even I ordered XXL-16W. Actually I'm wearing regular 14-16 and 38C. As for me, I would prefer if the top would be more freestyle. Product picture doesn't display very well how it would fit a full figure.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena

customer_reviews.title: Never again 😔
customer_reviews.text: It did not fit and I am still thinking about sending it back but I had such a headache with the first bathing suit that I had to send back, I had to get Amazon involved in order to resolve the issue. I will never deal with this mfg again.
customer_reviews.author: Marie C

customer_reviews.title: Same as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This product was EXACTLY as described. I ordered my normal size-medium. It comes with removable cups which I would not recommend wearing with it. Thank you for the great product. It even arrived earlier than expected and just in time for my trip!
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: Not for chunky girls
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and sized up like told. I still wear this bathing suit so it’s not awful! But I’m chunky and even with big boobs it’s still kind big on top. I have to lift my boobs back into the cups often which I don’t really wanna do on public. And it’s not long enough. It’s just long enough it covers my belly but if I raise my arms it comes up. Wouldn’t recommend for chunky girls
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Adorable! I haven't worn a bathing suit in years ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! I haven't worn a bathing suit in years bc I hate how I look in one, but this is cute and flattering. I'm 5'2" and 140 and it fits great. Maybe a little snug, but the next size would definitely be way too big, and bathing suits generally stretch. I would have given it a 5 star, but the seam under the chest does not line up... so the stripes don't line up, and it's a little eye catching in that area.
customer_reviews.author: ps

customer_reviews.title: Not for busty girls
customer_reviews.text: Saw all of the great reviews and couldn't wait to try on this suit. However, at 5'0", 130lbs, & 32DDD, it wasn't quite the right fit for me. I got this in Medium. The bottom was great, loved the length & coverage. It's just that the top wasn't very supportive and I could just imagine my "girls" flapping around and out of the molded cups while I am chasing after my toddler. The colors are vibrant and beautiful, a little loose around the middle. However, if not for the bust support, I would give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Eyes 24

customer_reviews.title: Awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: These were a very awkward fit. I am not sure what all the great reviews were about. They were very think, a lot of material for a swim suit. Not something I would want to wear on the beach or get wet, way too hot. Overall, it was cute....maybe for tennis or something, not for the beach or swimwear. I just didn't find it comfortable at all. Also, I am a DDD and the top was not supportive what so ever. It would keep the girls in but unless you have fake super perky boobs, they are not going to look nice or even decent.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W.

customer_reviews.title: Flattering, fits TTS
customer_reviews.text: Really cute suit. I got it to wear to the lake when I’m in my SUP. It fits as expected based on reviews. I am 5’4” 140# and decided to get large so it wasn’t right in my waist area - it’s a little big in the chest (36B) but I couldn’t have gone smaller on the bottoms, they’re perfect. Good quality material and stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Sookie

customer_reviews.title: Nice swimsuit looks like a dress.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Covers all the needed areas and super comfortable. I got the 2xl and the top fits good in my chest area I use 38F bras and it stretch enough for them. They have padding so should look good regardless of cup size. The rest of the swim suit was bit loose so Im not sure if Im keeping it or changing it for XL. I'm 5'3 around 190 pounds and normally wear size 15 on pants and XL on shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Gen O

customer_reviews.title: Fits small.
customer_reviews.text: Cute swim suit! I can wear mediums, but usually go with large to insure a looser fit. This time a large was still too tight. Its a two piece which I didn't pick up on in the description, I like that it is a two piece. I will return this one and get an XL in a color where the stripes aren't too much of a contrast, light blue I think. I ordered the black one and the horizontal stripes contrasted against the black and were a bit unflattering in the hind view. I really should stick to the front view though, my back rarely looks as good as I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great two-piece suit.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8" tall, and love this two piece suit. Love it for my water zumba, aqua spinning, and all pool activities. No straps to adjust, yanking on bottoms to pull back down, and bottom even gives my belly a flatter appearance. Great coverage and hides my saddlebags. Can you believe I admitted that?
customer_reviews.author: Linda 1

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great suit! Perfect for my upcoming Caribbean cruise! I ordered one size up and am happy I did. I am an older lady who hasn't worn a bathing suit in years but I took the gamble...... and I won! TYVM
customer_reviews.author: G. Funk

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9" and 155-160 lbs. The large fit so perfect, I don't want to take it off. I have gained some weight, used to be super skinny and it's been a bit of a transition to find that suit that makes me feel good. This is it. It looks adorable, feels great on and has excellent support. It is SIMPLY PERFECT and looks so utterly cute. The cut is great, and the skirt flares just enough to give your body a balanced look. I want to wear this ALL THE TIME.
customer_reviews.author: Slim Vaaljapie

customer_reviews.title: Need bigger sizes and more accurate sizing.
customer_reviews.text: The suit arrived quickly, and was very very cute, as pictured...just too small. Bought for my Mom, and as others have mentioned, the top is just too snug. Usually 2X is more than ample. It fits me, but the tank rides up. We're going to keep it...I may find another tank Mom can wear with the bottoms, which do have that saucy flare as pictured. Have not worn in pool yet, so cannot speak to durability.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Very cute! Chest runs a bit larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute suit! I love it. That being said, here are the cons: the skirt holds an incredible amount of water. The top wants to slip when swimming. I’m a 36C and I ordered a large, because that is generally what I have to do. It’s a little big in the chest!!! Not enough to send back, though. I do love this suit.
customer_reviews.author: Pleu

customer_reviews.title: Cute and modest fit.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a beach day when I was 5 months pregnant-made me feel great and still modest, wore it throughout pregnancy, near the end my belly stuck out a little bit what can you expect. Then I’ve worn it multiple times after I lost my baby weight (but now had a very different belly shape lol) and still thought it was flattering and fit nicely. The drawstrings are key. I would recommend this to anyone who wants to remain modest and still feel cute and look good at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: This bathing suit is awesome. It's a two piece
customer_reviews.text: This bathing suit is awesome. It's a two piece, and very cute. The little skirt is excellent: fun with a little flippiness, and fits wonderfully. The skirt is a fair amount of fabric which floats around when you're in the water, but that's fine. The styling on the top allows for a little loose fabric at the bottom, which makes the belly less noticeable. The foam inserts on top were awkward and didn't offer enough support for my large chest, so I bought a racing-back bra to wear under it. The foam inserts were easily removed. It felt SO good wearing a bra and the cute suit, I felt confident and happy. I highly recommend this suit!
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Modest, but not matronly!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this suit. Modest, without being matronly. I'm difficult to fit but this fit very well! I'm 5'4 usually wear an 8-10. Large busted. Measurements 39-31-40. Bought a Large. Fits great. My hubby is impressed. The bra isn't the best but I knew that going in. Thank you for the pics and reviews. Seeing it on real women helped me know what to expect. Plan to buy in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Charity Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected,  super cute, modest style
customer_reviews.text: This swimdress is super cute. I am not comfortable in a lot of bathing suits, but this one covers everything you want to hide and looks great! It fits as expected, I wear a size large shirt and size 12 pants and ordered the large 10-12, it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Cute Summer Mae swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this tankini I ordered a size-up based on other reviews and I shouldn't have it's slightly large. This is a great swimsuit for hiding a not quite perfect body and still looking cute. My complaint is that this swimsuit is actually made by Summer Mae and I would have bought it directly from them (for less) had I known that this was just a reseller.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, fits well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this bathing suit. It looks like an outfit. I can swim, and if I need to run an errand quickly, I don't need to wear a cover-up. The bathing suit is also very comfortable and doesn't feel cheap or thin. It's an excellent value for the money that I spent. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leftenant

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest swimsuit I think I have ever owned. It is styled like a tank top with a mini skirt but works like a fantastic two piece swim set. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: demma

customer_reviews.title: Stunning & flattering bathing suit!
customer_reviews.text: Stunning & flattering bathing suit . I ordered both the navy & pink & love them both! Of course I was nervous Ordering a bathing suit online. I’m 5’3 and 130 pounds and got the medium. It fits perfectly! If you were debating whether or not to get the suit just get it. It’s one of the cutest bathing suits that I’ve ever owned
customer_reviews.author: JOANT

customer_reviews.title: Classy & Cute
customer_reviews.text: Love this swimsuit. As a very real plus size woman I was so nervous that this garment would feel cheap and lack support but it holds everything in and I feel totally “clute” (classy & cute) in this swimsuit. It’s a swimsuit for all shapes and sizes. Flattering I read about the bust pads and I don’t see a problem with them - they feel totally supportive. Can’t wait to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky boy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, good coverage, little bust support for bustier ladies.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute! I’m a size 14-16 women’s US. I bought this for a cruise. Looks very cute on, like a tennis dress. But no bust support; I’m a 34 DD, and 5’ 10” tall. So I purchased a white racer back sports brand wore it underneath. Perfect fix! I plan to wear it on our boat at the lake this summer.
customer_reviews.author: UCmba97

customer_reviews.title: Skirt has a lot of extra material... It Sticks out like a hoop-skirt.
customer_reviews.text: Ugh.. I hoped I’d love this more! The top is cute, but the bottom skirt felt huge with way too much fabric (i am a size 4-6). Not the seat part, but the actual skirt itself has so much material, it feels more like an actual skirt... Not a swimsuit skirt. I’m very used to wearing swim skirts, but this is the fullest skirt I’ve ever seen... It actually sticks out, similar to, like. a hoop-skirt. It reminds me of an old-school cheerleading skirt, actually. It looks far fuller than the photos depict.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this bathing suit I can't rave enough. For the price you wonder before you get it will it be good quality... But I can attest that it's sewn well, the fabric is not cheap. FIT! THE FIT! It's incredible. The pads on the top are super thick which is great. I really dislike those stupid flimsy triangles that migrate all over your boob making you look like an idiot and do not conceal any nip. Despite there being no wire its totally pushing and holding up my 36dd. I am for reference 5ft 165-175 and the xl is absolute perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny Oneil

customer_reviews.title: This suit is very cute on and comfortable. It brings the eye upward
customer_reviews.text: This suit is very cute on and comfortable. It brings the eye upward. The shirt fell just a little too short for me as I am tall. I also have a few "rolls" around the middle and it showed some, however the bust fit extremely well. If you are wanting a cute, modest, swimsuit, I would recommend this one. Looks just like in the picture except I didn't have that much excess in the shirt length. Had I gone a size up, I think the bust might have been too big for me. I have large hips and small bust comparatively. Hope that helps!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndell Bohl

customer_reviews.title: Great for Moms.
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit arrived while we were getting ready to go to the pool. I tried it on and decided to go ahead and wear it. I received two complements within the hour! It’s flattering and stays in place. Running after an 18 month old and a 5 year old, having a bathing suit stay in place is very important! I love the suit so much that I’m buying another.
customer_reviews.author: mgsmiss

customer_reviews.title: Buy this suit!
customer_reviews.text: Great suit, especially for the price! Flattering cut and size Large was spot on for me. I'm a pear shaped, 5'6" & 175 lbs. It's sporty, super cute, and very comfortable. I get tons of compliments in it and don't mind wearing it all day. I've always hesitated to buy suits online but after this purchase will consider it in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey D.

customer_reviews.title: Fits tighter than expected, but still cute
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit fits a little tighter than the one piece I also ordered from this company. I was so pleased with the one piece that I ordered this as well. It's very cute on, just a bit tighter than I wanted. I would have ordered up a size if I'd known it fit tighter than their other suits. Also, I'm small chested and the top fits perfect on me in that area. Just a forewarning if you are large chested, it will likely be way to tight in the chest. All in all, I'm happy with it, just wish it was a bit looser.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Cute and hides the flaws
customer_reviews.text: So, I haven't worn a bathing suite since I was in my 30's but I had to get one for my grand daughters pool party. This style is very flattering. It hides all the things I didn't want to show. The skirt gives it a cute flare. The top hides a not so flat tummy. It won't make you thin again but it's a very darling style that's vintage and fun.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for better!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for her talent for their special needs beauty pageant. She is the one on the far right. Very good quality bathing suit. She used it for a beach themed dance. Could not ask for better! It was comfortable and was super cute
customer_reviews.author: Kristyn DiBitetetto

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this suit. It is just what I was looking for. It covered all my problem areas. I wasn't worried about being exposed or falling out of my bottoms so I was able to enjoy my time out on the boat with friends and family. Coloring is great. material and quality was better than expected for the price. I am going to order another set in a different color. Loved
customer_reviews.author: Lori Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Cute swimsuit
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute swimsuit. I'm 5'2, 115-120 lbs and the small fit perfect. The navy is perfect for my 4th of July party. The padding can be removed but it wasn't overly big that it made my top look bigger than normal. I may buy this in a different color. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: MAC13

customer_reviews.title: I love this bathing suit
customer_reviews.text: I love this bathing suit. I am not one to buy a bathing suit on line, but after reading the other reviews, I took a chance. This bathing suit looks exactly like the picture. The fit is flattering for my "apple" shape body. It covers all the areas (butt, slims in mid section) to make you comfortable wearing around friends. This suit is durable (I have worn it in salt water, fresh water, chlorine water/pool). I rinse it after every use in water and have thrown it in the washer. The suit looks the same as the first day it was delivered. I have had it for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Looked good, but fit is terrible and looks tacky
customer_reviews.text: Suit looked good, but it fits terrible and looks tacky. Nothing attractive about it when you get it on. I donated it to Goodwill and it probably still there :(
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Boothe-Brown

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful suit, arrived moldy.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of this suit that I have ordered. I loved my navy one so much, I ordered the pink. However, I am downgrading this a star from 5, because it arrived with moisture in the actual product packaging, was growing mold, and stunk to high Heaven. I soaked it, and washed it, for it to be wearable, and was thankfully just fine, but had that not worked, it would have been shipped to me, already ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Small.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart says XL will fit size 16 - 18, but it's about 2 sizes too small for my wife. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Hobage

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: It's as if the pieces were switched with another set. The top is true to size and flattering and comfortable. The bottoms are bigger than needed. The top and bottoms seem to be different sizes. I love it but I dont get the tummy control as I would if the bottoms were correct size. The suit is absolutely cuter than cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Not the same as it used to be. I bought this swimsuit while ago and it was my absolute favorite! But I left it out in the sun for a couple days and it bleached it so I went to order a new one. This one doesn't fit nearly as well. :( I returned it! Not the worst but there are better fits out there.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Covering
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice swimsuit. I'm 5'7" about 170 and wear a 40DD bra. This suit covered up all the things I didn't want to show and was comfortable to wear. The skirt and underlying bottom fit nicely without riding up or pinching. The skirt did not float up too much and the top stayed put. I'm well pleased with this swimsuit.
customer_reviews.author: S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no support
customer_reviews.text: If you have larger than "average" breasts, skip this suit. It's cute, but there is absolutely no support for the chest area at all. I wanted to like it, I really did. I loved how it looked, but the breasts were free like I wasn't wearing anything at all. If you're smaller chested, then this is cute as crap, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait just buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this suit for my 14 year old self conscious daughter for a year. They horizontal stripes made me hesitant. I read the reviews and saw the pictures and finally made the purchase. Score it is totally adorable and she loves it. Skirt is the best part and love the top. She will feel confident wearing this around her peers!
customer_reviews.author: Nikkithegreek

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and modest
customer_reviews.text: This swimsuit has great coverage and looks super cute. I took off one star because its lacking the support I need on top. However, I plan to keep it and possibly get a swim bra. I can wear it alone as well but while playing in the pool with my kids, I need the support. I am 5ft4.5in, 175lbs, 38DD and got the size XL.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Not flattering.  At all unless you are size 5
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bathing suit but buyer beware... Maybe get a couple sizes larger than you think you need. It fits but is NOT flattering in any way, shape or form. Not loose fitting as picture shows. I will not be seen in public until I lose another 100 lbs. Lol
customer_reviews.author: heidilynn1003

customer_reviews.title: Skirt isn’t flattering/no chest support
customer_reviews.text: Definitely no support in the “bra” area. If you are cool with how your breasts are in a loose sports bra or nothing at all then this is ok for you. the skirt is high waisted which I love but the material doesn’t do much for tummy control and the band above the navy skirt has the stripes on it like the top but just makes that roll pop out. I wish the bottom was smaller with better tummy control and I wish the top was longer. I show in my picture where the top ends and bottom begins. Really bummed about this one. I wanted it to work so bad bc it’s really super cute
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: I just got this swim suit in the mail , got it the next day , super fast shipping for me. I had to try it on asap . I am 5"5 and 150lbs. I got a size large and it fits perfectly. I love this swim suit ! I got the navy color, it's so cute and comfortable . It will be perfect for me at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Matthews

customer_reviews.title: FREAKING CUTE!!
customer_reviews.text: 5ft 4in - 200 lbs - 38J bust - US Sz 14/16 I ordered 2X and it is DARLING!! I’m excited to go to the pool again, FINALLY! Something cute to wear!!! Only bummer is it needs a “little” more room in the midsection for the plus sizes. I’d feel better with a 2X bottom and a 3X-4X top. The stripes accentuate the rolls a little lol Oh well. Still ADORABLE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom, as a surprise, for a trip. I have never seen her in a bathing suit. She is 69 years old and she was so cute in it! She loved it! She is about 5'3 and a medium size. It was modest enough so that she felt comfortable getting in and out of the water without feeling self-conscious. I might get one for myself! It arrived in great condition, packed into a plastic, reusable sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Cute and modest, lots of compliments.
customer_reviews.text: Works well for hiding your belly and thighs. I simply was not comfortable in two pieces or one pieces that I've gotten before, and these style swimsuits made me feel very comfortable, which makes all the difference in the world. I bought XXL, carry most of my weight in my belly, and am 5'3" and about 165 lbs and it fit perfectly. Also, you can wear a tshirt over the swimsuit and although the skirt is short, it kinda looks like its own outfit, so you don't have to worry about a coverup.
customer_reviews.author: hr puffystuff

customer_reviews.title: My favorite suit-I have 3!
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of bathing suits. This suit makes up 3 of my collection! I have two black and one navy. Super flattering, supportive without feeling stuffed, and functional. The skirt is flirty and cute but covers so I can bend over or squat down with the kids without fear. If you have a large bust you may need added support.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Runs small- go up a size
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size M or L, and had to buy an XL...that’s my only complaint. Otherwise, I love the quality & fit, especially the chest support!
customer_reviews.author: Ruthie Archer

product_meta.title: MiYang Women's Tankini Striped Vintage Swim Dress
feature_bullets: 【Standard Sizes of USA】Please select your normal US sizes and suggest to choose one large size if you have large bust or hips. Also please see the product description and our size chart as reference. Any queries,please contact MiYang company directly.
【Tummy Control Function】Removable and Replaceable Cup Pads. Drawstrings on the top sides, looks slim and beauty.
【Flared Skirt with Bikini Brief】Flared skirt & cut leg briefs inside are conducive to hiding all flaws still contours your curves perfectly.
【Material: 82%Nylon, 18%Spandex】Nice Thick Stretchy Spandex Type and Good Stitching.
【Stripe design&More Color Choices】Vintage Striped, Classic&Simple. Ruched design in the waist area, look slim, vintage and stylish.
